data.actual_result: The toast appears behind the menu.
data.expected_result: The toast should appear on top of the **Add content** menu
data.short_description: Information toasts, show up behind the **And content** menu.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to add content. - Long press on one of the 4 icons. - Quickly exit the upload menu - Observe the toast fade away on RHS if the screen.
